mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barter Theatre 1983 poster for six plays
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for The Mousetrap by Agatha Christie| Bus Stop by William Ange| Fallen Angels by Noel Coward| "DA" by Hugh Leonard| The Dining Room by A. R. Gurney, Jr.| Dial "M" for Murder by Frederick Knott and an unannounced comedy or musical.

Virginia

This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes.
